Title: Relates to admissible evidence in court proceedings to secure an order of protection
Summary: Clarifies that in child protective proceedings and permanency hearings for children placed out of their homes, the social worker-client privilege shall not be a ground for excluding evidence in a hearing to secure an order of protection.
LawCode: Amd ยง1046, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to admissible evidence in court proceedings to secure an order of protection
